title: Pili Pala
overview: Sara Morris is excellent in her job. A specialist in the Department of Fetal Medicine, she loves bringing new lives into the world and is determined to give every woman the best possible experience when giving birth to their child, despite the lack of funding and lack of staff in the department. When her friend Elin asks Sara to look after her she accepts immediately, against the advice of her colleagues. She is so happy for her friend who is pregnant after years of failure and pain. But when complications arise Sara is put in an impossible situation.
